PART.P: I'm very much surprised to receive your letter announcing the first prize in your competition and I'm looking forward to spend the two weeks at Camp California.
Just because I'm studying at the moment and I won't have my holidays till July. This is the month that best suits me. The second week of July would be perfect to start my trip.
I would rather sleep in a log cabin. I find it will be much more comfortable than a tent.

The leisure activities sound fantastic especially climbing and photography. I'm very keen on climbing. I've joined a climbing group in my town 2 years and reached the top of several middle-high mountains. The other activity I would like to try is photography. I have no previous experience on it but I wish I'd learn a lot.
However, there are some questions that I want to ask you about. Do I need passport to travel? What kind of clothes would be appropriate, winter or summer? Are there any food service at the camp?
I hope to hear from you soon.
